repair.repairedDockerfile:
# File generated by github.com/posener/goaction. DO NOT EDIT.


FROM golang:1.14.2-alpine3.11
RUN apk add --no-cache git

COPY . /home/src
WORKDIR /home/src
RUN go build -o /bin/action ./cmd/goaction

ENTRYPOINT [ "/bin/action" ]
